extension.summary: Template for a Audio DSP Addon
extension.description: You can use this template to see how the ADSP Addon API works or to start a new ADSP Addon.[CR]Preprocessing/Postprocessing only copies input to output.[CR]Master process implements a simple channel upmixer (e.g. stereo to 5.1) by copying the input channel to output channels.
extension.disclaimer: Just contains one Preprocess-, Masterprocess- and Postprocess-Mode.
